summary:
CONNECT - Get early access to our NFT collection!

 WELCOME TO AnimAI SOCIAL CLUB - It is a place for all hard-working anims like you and I to connect and chat about AI

 $ANIMAI & OUR ECOSYSTEM - $ANIMAI is the core token used within the AnimAI ecosystem. We want $ANIMAI to be at the heart and centre of everything that we do here. What this means is that $ANIMAI will be equipped with staking utility and will be used as a purchasing token for upcoming AnimAI related initiatives on our roadmap.

 G.O.A.L. - Life's too short for anything less than awesome, and our beloved anims deserve only the best. As thinkers, innovators, party animals, and life aficionados, we break free from the ordinary and truly Get Out And Live!

 OUR STORY - HOW IT BEGINS? I used to work hard, really hard 24/7. No joke. Last year on my birthday, I forgot... and I worked 'til late. I missed the surprise b-day party that my partner prepared for me. So here I am telling us Anims to get out and live! AI ROCKS. I am working 10x more efficiently with AI tools now.

 GET IN TOUCH - IT IS A PLACE FOR ALL HARD-WORKING ANIMS LIKE YOU AND I TO CONNECT AND CHAT ABOUT AI. LOOKING AHEAD

 ROADMAP - PHASE 1: BUILD A STRONG COMMUNITY - Social Media Soft Opening, Launch AnimAI Social Club Web App, Limited Edition Mint, $ANIMAI Token Launch, $ANIMAI Token Listing on DEX, Activate Liquidity Mine, Staking with Anim’s friends, Airdrop to Anim’s friends, Milestone Token Burns. PHASE 2: MAKE IT MORE FUN WITH AI & NFT - Anim CRE8R (Community NFT), Anim Lourve Museum (NFT Gallery), Don’t let your boss know (AI Marketplace), Referral Mechanism.
